SummaryEnglish: In this story set in the early 1920s, Tamahiko is the son of a wealthy family, but his life is changed forever when an accident cripples his right arm. No longer considered by his father as an heir, he is shuffled off into the country, to live out of sight. The teenage Tamahiko shuts himself in his new home, bitterly thinking of it as the place where he will die. One day, he learns that his father has 'bought' him a bride to take care of him, when the young teen girl named Yuzuki arrives at his door. She comes into his life like an innocent ray of sunshine, and Tamahiko's view of the world and his life starts changing bit-by-bit.

1.TitleEnglish: 大正処女御伽話 アニメ前日譚
1.SummaryEnglish: 第1話放送に先駆けて「大正オトメ御伽話　アニメ前日譚」の放送が決定！ 詳細情報 ＜番組内容＞ 出演は小林裕介さん(志磨珠彦役)、会沢紗弥さん(立花夕月役)、宮本侑芽さん(志磨珠子役)に加えて、桐丘さな先生・羽鳥潤監督・シリーズ構成／脚本福田裕子さんのスタッフ対談もお届けします！アニメ放送を前に「大正オトメ御伽話」の魅力をたっぷり語ります。
The disabled son of a wealthy family is banished to await death in exile--until his father purchases a girl to care for him and be his future bride.

2.SummaryEnglish: Tamahiko receives shocking news from home. A shopping trip to Tokyo provides a welcome change of pace. An unwelcome guest shows up on their doorstep.

3.SummaryEnglish: Yuzuki brings a gloomy Tamahiko to an enchanted corner of the mountain while his prickly little sister Tamako makes herself at home in the villa.

4.SummaryEnglish: A hard-working Yuzuki collapses in the summer heat, causing Tamahiko to question his worth as her partner and Tamako to consider her future calling.

5.SummaryEnglish: Yuzuki holds a celebration for Tamahiko that means more to him than either one realizes. A stranger with mysterious intentions appears in the house.

6.SummaryEnglish: Determined to recover Yuzu's bookmark, Tamahiko winds up doing the thief's family a favor. After Tamako clues him in, Tamahiko must make things right.

7.SummaryEnglish: Tamahiko leans into his new teaching gig. Yuzuki reveals a momentous fact about herself. Ryotaro is torn about a big financial opportunity in Tokyo.

8.SummaryEnglish: The gang flocks to see popular singer Kotori Shiratori perform nearby. The Shima family reputation precedes Tamahiko at his new school, to his dismay.

9.SummaryEnglish: Kotori seeks inspiration from Tamahiko and Yuzuki's relationship for a new song, while Tamahiko learns why Hakaru is avoiding his famous-singer twin.

10.SummaryEnglish: An old school friend invites Yuzuki to visit in Tokyo, but she's hesitant to leave Tamahiko alone. A tragedy spurs Tamahiko to make a decisive move.

11.SummaryEnglish: With help from his friends, Tamahiko combs through a ruined Tokyo searching for the missing Yuzuki. A chance encounter leads to a shocking discovery.

12.SummaryEnglish: Yuzuki reflects on her experience in Tokyo and gains the resolve to tell Tomohiko how she feels. Friends and family gather in grateful celebration.
